newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks close higher as blue chips gain.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks close higher as blue chips gain.

text.p: Dhaka stocks closed higher as major engineering and leather blue chips gained on buying by both small and institutional investors, brokers said.
The Dhaka Stock exchange all-share price index rose 19.26 points or 1.6 percent at 1,218.04 on a turnover of 56.3 million taka. Of 127 traded issues 79 gained and 46 lost.

Brokers said the market recovered some of the losses on Monday when the index fell 5.23 percent. Singer Bangladesh gained 109 taka to 8,303, Beximco Pharma rose 2.32 to 152.6 and Bata Shoe was up 11.5 to 153.7.
